recipeInstructions.text: Mix yeast sachet, sugar and warm water together and let it sit until foamy.
Add the yeast/water mix to the bowl of a stand mixer along with the yoghurt and olive oil and mix to combine.

Add the flour and salt in with the wet ingredients and start mixing on low with the dough hook, Increase speed once flour has all mixed in. The dough should be soft and slightly sticky, add more flour if needed.
Place the dough in an oiled bowl and cover for about an hour and a half until the dough has doubled in size.
Once it has doubled in size, roll the dough into a log on a floured bench and cut into 6 pieces.
Place in a 220Â°C preheated oven for 20 minutes. Bagels are ready to served!
Brush each cooked naan with melted butter or garlic butter.
